▪ Generalization of the Euclidean distance (Minkowski distance)
– r = 1: Manhattan distance (L1 norm)
• d(x, y) = |x1 – y1| + |x2 – y2| + … + |xn – yn|
– r = 2: Euclidean distance (L2 norm)
– r = ∞: Supremum distance (Lmax or L∞ norm)
